resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/158009</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>158009</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1978</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Reading strategies: Words Used in Questions</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lesestrategien: Wörter verwendet in den 
Fragen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Stratégies de lecture : Mots utilisés 
dans les questions</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estratégias da leitura: Palavras usadas 
nas perguntas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Strategie della lettura: Parole usate nelle
domande</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Στρατηγικές ανάγνωσης: Λέξεις που 
χρησιμοποιούνται στις ερωτήσεις</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estrategias de la lectura: Palabras usadas 
en preguntas</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is a worksheet to improve reading strategies and focuses on the understanding and use of question words.All parts of the worksheet except one can be done in English but it includes additionally translations to hebrew.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vocabulary</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">questions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">translation</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist ein Bogen, zum von von von von 
Lesestrategien und -foki auf dem Verständnis und dem Gebrauch von 
Frage words.All Teilen des Bogens zu verbessern, ausgenommen man auf 
englisch getan werden kann, aber es zusätzlich Übersetzungen zum 
Hebräer einschließt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est un tableau pour améliorer des stratégies 
et des foyers de lecture sur l'arrangement et l'utilisation des 
pièces de la question words.All du tableau à moins qu'un puisse 
être fait en anglais mais il inclut supplémentaire des traductions 
à l'hébreu.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta é uma folha para melhorar estratégias e 
focos da leitura na compreensão e no uso das peças da pergunta 
words.All da folha a não ser que uma possa ser feito em inglês mas 
inclui adicionalmente traduções ao hebrew.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è un foglio di lavoro per migliorare le 
strategie ed i fuochi della lettura sulla comprensione e sull'uso 
delle parti di domanda words.All del foglio di lavoro a meno che uno 
possa essere fatto in inglese ma include ulteriormente le traduzioni 
ad ebreo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι ένα φύλλο εργασίας για να βελτιώσει τις 
στρατηγικές ανάγνωσης και εστιάζει στην κατανόηση και τη χρήση 
των λέξεων ερώτησης Όλα τα μέρη του φύλλου εργασίας εκτός
από ένα μπορούν να γίνουν στα αγγλικά αλλά περιλαμβάνει 
πρόσθετα τις μεταφράσεις στα εβραϊκά.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esto es una hoja de trabajo para mejorar 
estrategias y focos de la lectura en la comprensión y el uso de las 
piezas de la pregunta words.All de la hoja de trabajo a menos que una 
se pueda hacer en inglés pero incluye además traducciones al hebreo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wortschatz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fragen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Übersetzung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vocabulaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">questions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">traduction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">vocabulário</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">perguntas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">tradução</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">vocabolario</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">domande</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">traduzione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">λεξιλόγιο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ερωτήσεις</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μετάφραση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">vocabulario</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">preguntas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">traducción</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
